energy_propulsion.name: Energy Propulsion
energy_propulsion.description: Lizzy propels herself using energy from her palms, moving an extra 20 ft; • Next attack receives advantage

radiant_resonance.name: Radiant Resonance
radiant_resonance.description: Emits a pulse of energy that reveals hidden enemies within 30 ft radius

stellar_surge.name: Stellar Surge
stellar_surge.description: Enhances next attack or spell, adding 1d6 radiant damage; • Lasts until next attack or end of next turn

astral_field.name: Astral Field
astral_field.description: Creates a shimmering energy field, granting +2 AC for 1 turn

luminous_barrage.name: Luminous Barrage
luminous_barrage.description: For 3 turns, automatically fires two force projectiles at nearby opponents; • Attack Roll: 2d20m(INT) for single target, 1d20+(INT) per projectile for multiple targets; • CON save (DC 10) if hit to maintain concentration

photon_jab.name: Photon Jab
photon_jab.description: A swift, energy-infused punch; • On critical hit, target pushed back 10 ft; • Grants 5 MP on hit

pulse_flurry.name: Pulse Flurry
pulse_flurry.description: Unleashes a flurry of electrically charged punches; • Attack Roll: 3d20m2; • 25% chance to stun opponent for their next turn

radiant_burst.name: Radiant Burst
radiant_burst.description: Releases a short-range burst of radiant energy; • DEX save vs spell save DC; • Imposes attack roll disadvantage on failed save

stellar_uppercut.name: Stellar Uppercut
stellar_uppercut.description: Energy-infused uppercut that launches target into the air; • On hit, launches target 15 ft up; • If used as second hit in combo, launch height increases to 25 ft

comet_dive.name: Comet Dive
comet_dive.description: Powerful downward strike against airborne target; • Can only be used against airborne targets; • Slams target to ground, dealing extra damage and leaving them prone

ethereal_needles.name: Ethereal Needles
ethereal_needles.description: Materializes shimmering energy needles; • Duration: 3 turns; • Enables needle-based attacks

needle_thrust.name: Needle Thrust
needle_thrust.description: Quick, precise jab with a needle; • Deals half damage but gains advantage on attack roll

arcane_sweep.name: Arcane Sweep
arcane_sweep.description: Sweeping attack targeting multiple enemies within 15 ft arc

spectral_toss.name: Spectral Toss
spectral_toss.description: Throws a needle with pinpoint accuracy; • 50% crit chance (On roll of 1-10 on d20); • Range: 25 ft

celestial_bombardment.name: Celestial Bombardment
celestial_bombardment.description: Charges and throws a colossal sphere of energy causing massive explosion; • Cast Time: 1 turn; • 20 ft radius explosion; • DEX save for half damage; • Failed save: disadvantage on next attack; • Armor on startup prevents interruption

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Creates massive explosion of stellar energy; • Cast Time: 2 turns; • 20 ft radius; • DEX save vs spell save DC for half damage; • Area remains charged until start of next turn (1d6 radiant damage to creatures in area)

aurora_wall.name: Aurora Wall
aurora_wall.description: Conjures a radiant wall to repel attacks; • CON save vs attack roll; • Success: attack negated; • Failure: damage reduced by half

starlight_maneuver.name: Starlight Maneuver
starlight_maneuver.description: Enhances agility to evade attack, releases stun bombs toward attacker; • +4 AC until next turn; • Counter-attack range: 15 ft; • DEX save vs spell save DC; • Failed save: stunned until end of next turn; • Success: disadvantage on next attack

heat_protection.name: Heat Protection
heat_protection.description: Conjures protective energy barrier; • Duration: 2 turns; • INT save (DC 12); • Success: temp HP equal to INT modifier; • Failure: barrier fails; • Grants 3d4+INT temp HP
